Datetime Utilities¶

The tempodb.temporal.validate module contains utilities for datetime and timezone handling.

tempodb.temporal.validate.check_time_param(t)[source]¶

Check whether a string sent in matches the ISO8601 format. If a Datetime object is passed instead, it will be converted into an ISO8601 compliant string.

Parameters:t (string or Datetime) – the datetime to check
Return type:string
tempodb.temporal.validate.convert_iso_stamp(t, tz=None)[source]¶

Convert a string in ISO8601 form into a Datetime object. This is mainly used for converting timestamps sent from the TempoDB API, which are assumed to be correct.

Parameters:t (string) – the timestamp to convert
Return type:Datetime object
